Core.desc: The core of mootools. Is required by all the others, but has no dependancies and can be used stand-alone. Contains Basic functions and Initializers.

Array.desc: Contains Array Prototypes, like copy, each, contains, remove.

String.desc: Contains String and Number Prototypes, like camelCase, capitalize, test, toInt.

Function.desc: Contains Function Prototypes, like create, bind, pass, delay, periodical.

Hash.desc: the Hash, allows to attach prototypes, to overcome the javascript practical impossibility to extend [Object object]s.

Class.desc: Contains the Class Function, to easily create, extend, implement reusable Classes.

Class.Extras.desc: Contains Extra Class methods to be implemented in your own classes, to ease the execution of the most common tasks.

Element.desc: One of the most important item of mootools, contains the dollar function, the dollars function, and an handful of cross-browser, time-saver methods to let you easily work with HTML Elements.

Element.Style.desc: Contains useful Element methods, to set/get styles in a fashionable way.

Element.Event.desc: Contains the Event Class, Element methods to deal with Element events, custom Events.

Element.Filters.desc: Adds Filtering Capabilities to Element Collections.

Element.Dimensions.desc: Contains Element methods to work with element size, scroll, or position in space.

Element.Form.desc: Contains Element methods to work with forms.

Selectors.desc: Adds Advanced Css Selectors capability to Elements.

Window.Size.desc: Function to get window dimensions in a crossbrowser fashion.

Fx.CSS.desc: Contains the CSS animation logic. Used by Styles based Effects.

Fx.Elements.desc: Effect to change any number of css properties to any number of elements.

Fx.Style.desc: Effect to change any css property for an element.

Fx.Styles.desc: Effect to change any number of css properties for an element.

Fx.Morph.desc: Effect to morph an element from one css class to another.

Fx.Scroll.desc: Effect to scroll any element, including the window.

Fx.Transitions.desc: Contains transitions to be used with any of the above effects.

Drag.desc: the basic drag class. you can use this to drag, resize and whatever you want to do when dragging the mouse.

Drag.Move.desc: Drag.Move extends Drag, adding support for draggable containers and droppables.

Ajax.desc: Extends the basic XHR with additional methods and utility functions.

Json.Remote.desc: Shortcut Class to send and receive Javascript Objects.

Assets.desc: Contains functions to load external files on the fly: images, css, javascript.

Color.desc: Class for creating and manipulating colors in JavaScript. Supports HSB->RGB Conversions and vice versa.

Hash.Cookie.desc: Lets you Create/Read/Delete Cookies in Json Format.

Scroller.desc: Lets you scroll the window when the mouse reaches certain boundaries.

Slider.desc: Lets you create horizontal and vertical sliders.

Sortables.desc: Creates an interface for drag and drop sorting of a list or lists.
